articles.description: On the cusp of massive fame, The Flash star Ezra Miller’s hedonistic spate of aggression may be their undoing.
articles.content: The Flash may depart the Speed Force if Warner Bros. has anything to say about actor Ezra Millers recent arrest for disorderly conduct. Miller, one of Hollywoods most well-known nonbinary actors, has… [+11036 chars]

articles.author: Laurence Dollimore
articles.title: The Queen, 95, pulls out of attending annual Maundy Day church service - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Queen has pulled out of attending the annual Maundy Day church service, Buckingham Palace has announced.
articles.content:
The Queen has pulled out of the annual Maundy Day church service 'with regret', Buckingham Palace has announced. 
In a first for her reign, the monarch, who turns 96 this month, will instead be repr… [+7735 chars]
